entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • visual basic interactive doesn't start for dotnet 6.0 #57911

Closed

  • ReplaceMethodWithPropertyCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #57769
    17.1
  • ReplacePropertyWithMethodsCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #57376
    17.1
  • CSharpAddBracesCodeFixProvider Exception with Visual Studio 2022 #57770
    17.1
  • AdditionalFiles or similar for codefix providers #57907

PullRequests

Created

  • Make scripting work in single-file deployments #57910
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57908
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #57906
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Fix replace-prop-with-method (and the opposite) when references are in linked files. #57891
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #57905
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57904
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Change the title of configure severity to resources file #57795
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Switch go-to-impl to be entirely async/non-blocking. #57861
    Area-IDE
  • [SourceLink] Use correct encoding for embedded text #57683
    Area-IDE
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community
